title: I accidently deleted Thunderbird then reinstalled it but I have lost my total address book.  How do I get it back?
creator: poohbear266
content: I had two Thunderbird apps on my computer. When I realized that one of them was for organizations, which I don't belong to, I deleted it. But both of the apps were deleted. I then reinstalled Thunderbird, but when I went to send an email, my entire address book was blank. How do I retrieve it and reinstall it ? Thank you.

title: My Thunderbird crash whenever I tried to "save as" an email, save the attachment of an email, attach a file to an outgoing email.
creator: andymokcv
content:
My Thunderbird crash whenever I tried to "save as" an email, save the attachment of an email, attach a file to an outgoing email.

Every time I did the mentioned, Thunderbird prompts the normal window of my laptop's folders, but it disappear in a second with the Thunderbird crash and quit.

This situation happened after I installed MS365 on my laptop.

I did try the below: 1. Reset attachment directory - mail.compose.attach.dir 2. Run in trouble shooting mode 3. Repair folder index 4. Clear cache

Anyone can help please?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/144.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;tb_version:115.18.0 (32-bit);os:Windows 10
